name: qPid
description:
qPid is a 2D Platformer/shooter made during Lovejam, where you go to Friendzoneland and kills all guys and girls that are like "brothers and sisters" ! Actually, you don't kill them, you break their chains so they can go out of Friendzoneland, good boy !

Made by two game design students, Mathieu Bouchonnet and Eric Miclo.
